welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Satghara, a charming city known for its rich culture and warm hospitality. Get ready to immerse yourself in its beauty and experience the vibrant atmosphere. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories exploring all that Satghara has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Darbhanga Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Darbhanga Airport handles the import and export of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Janakpur Airport handles all domestic flights within Nepal.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Janakpur Airport serves flights to and from neighboring countries.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in some areas.
